actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 in order to increase the number of members of the board of directors of such Authority to five and to set certain residence requirements.
short_title: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1981

summary.text: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1981 - Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to increase the number of members of the board of directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority from three to five. Specifies residency requirements for certain members of the board. Increases the number of members required for a quorum to three.

titles.title: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1981
A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 in order to increase the number of members of the board of directors of such Authority to five and to set certain residence requirements.
